Page._content:
# Firebase Messaging
### FCM (console:https://console.firebase.google.com/ )
### 
1. 
	1. ()
2. 
	1. Android 
		1. APP  package name
	2. 
3.  google.services.json
	1.  /app 
4.  Firebase SDK
	*  Android studio
    * [](https://firebase.google.com/docs/android/setup)
	* build.gradle(Project:PackageName)
	```Groovy 
	buildscript {
		dependencies {
			// Add this line
			classpath 'com.google.gms:google-services:xxx
		}
	```
		
	* build.gradle(Module:app)
	```Groovy 
	dependencies {
		// Add this line
		implementation 'com.google.firebase:firebase-messaging:xxx'
	}
	...
	// Add to the bottom of the file
	apply plugin: 'com.google.gms.google-services'
		
	```
5.  FCM Service
	1.  extends FirebaseMessagingService  class
		2. @Override
			1. onNewToken
				1. Token
			2. onMessageReceived
				* 
                * RemoteMessageFCM
                    * rm.getNotification
                        *  Notification 
                            *  title & body
                    * rm.getData
                        *  class =  Map<String,String>

```kt
class FCMService: FirebaseMessagingService() {
    override fun onNewToken(token: String) {
        super.onNewToken(token)
        Log.w("FCM Message onNewToken" , token)
    }

    override fun onMessageReceived(rm: RemoteMessage) {
        super.onMessageReceived(rm)
        Log.w("FCM Message Received" , "title: ${d?.get("title")}, body: ${d?.get("body")}")

    }


}
```
6. MainActivity
	1. FirebaseApp.initializeApp(MainActivity.this);
		1.  FCM
	2. FirebaseInstanceId.getInstance() 
		1.  APP FCM 
	3. getInstanceId()
		1.  registerID
		2. 
			1. addOnSuccessListener
				1. OnSuccessListener<InstanceIdResult>()
					1. Override
						1. onSuccess
			2. addOnFailureListener 
				1.  registerID 
				2. OnFailureListener
					1. Override
						1. onFailure

```kt
FirebaseApp.initializeApp(this)

var fcm = FirebaseInstanceId.getInstance()
//fcm
fcm.instanceId
    .addOnCompleteListener(object:OnCompleteListener<InstanceIdResult>{
        override fun onComplete(task: Task<InstanceIdResult>) {
            if (!task.isSuccessful) {
                Log.w("FCM Error", "getInstanceId failed", task.exception)

            }

            // Get new Instance ID token
            token = task.result?.token
            Log.d("FCM Complete", token)
            //  Toast.makeText(baseContext, token, Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
        }
    })
    .addOnFailureListener(object : OnFailureListener{
        override fun onFailure(task: Exception) {
            Toast.makeText(baseContext, task.toString() , Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
            Log.w("FCM Failure", task.toString())
        }
    })
```

7. AndroidManifest.xml
	1.  service
	
```xml
<service android:name=".FCMTest">
	<intent-filter>
		<action android:name="com.google.firebase.MESSAGING_EVENT"/>
	</intent-filter>
</service>
```
		
8. NOTE!!!!
	*  android SDK  Firebase SDK  Sync
	*  SDK
		* Tools -> Firebase
		* clound messaging
		* Set up Firebase Cloud Messaging
			1. Connnect your app to Firebase (step 1-3 )
			2. Add FCM to your app
				1.  SDK
			3. Handle messages (step 4-6 )
					
###  REST API
> [](https://firebase.google.com/docs/cloud-messaging/migrate-v1)
*  legacy HTTP   HTTP v1
    * legacy HTTP [](https://firebase.google.com/docs/cloud-messaging/http-server-ref)
        * url   
        > POST https://fcm.googleapis.com/fcm/send
        * token -  header
        > Authorization: key=  **FCM console**  > Cloud Messaging 
        *  -  body payload data Content-Typeapplication/json
            ```json
            {
                "to": "/topics/news",
                "notification": {
                    "title": "Breaking News",
                    "body": "New news story available."
                },
                "data": {
                    "story_id": "story_12345"
                }
            }
            ```
            * to - 
                * - `token`
                * topic - 
            * notification - 
                *  notification notification 
                *  title & body
            * data - 
    *  HTTP v1
        * url   
        > POST https://fcm.googleapis.com/v1/projects/[project-name]/messages:send
        * token -  header
        > Authorization: Bearer <valid Oauth 2.0 token>
        >> token 

## Question
*  NotRegistered
	* :
		1.  registerID 
	* :
		1. APP 
		2.  APP 
		3. token (4)
		4. App  Instance ID
> P.S.  Http protocol reference 

> P.S.  FCM console  https://console.firebase.google.com/

## Layout
### LinearLayout:
*  `horizontal()` or `vertical()`
    * horizontal:
        
    * vertical:
        
### RelativeLayout (Legacy):
* 
* 
*  `(toXXXOf)``(alignXXX)`
    * (toXXXOf):
        * ()
            * layout_above 
            * layout_below 
            * layout_toLeftOf        
    * (alignXXX):
        * ()
        * layout_alignTop 
        * layout_alignBottom 
        * layout_alignLeft 
        * layout_alignEight 
    * layout_toRightOf 
```xml
<RelativeLayout
    android:layout_width="409dp"
    android:layout_height="458dp"
    tools:layout_editor_absoluteX="1dp"
    tools:layout_editor_absoluteY="272dp">
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/txtName2"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="40dp"

        android:text="txtName2" />

    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/xxx"
        android:layout_below="@id/txtName2"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="40dp"
        android:text="xxx" />

    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/yyy"
        android:layout_width="173dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_alignBottom="@+id/xxx"
        android:layout_marginLeft="-2dp"
        android:layout_marginBottom="-116dp"
        android:text="yyy" />
    </RelativeLayout>
```

## Git #### git init git .git () --- #### git status git: * Changes to be commited: > * Changes not staged for commit: > * Untracked files: > * : > -s: * >EX: >> AM UnTrackedFile.txt
PS. AM * Stage() Working Directory * A = Add * M = Modify * ? = UnTracked --- #### git add EX: git add "file name" : * git add . : > * git add all : > --- #### git commit git * git commit -m "commit info"<---- * * window: * linux:vim * : git commit --allow-empty -m "" * : 1. -a: git add staging Area 2. --amend 1. commit --- #### git log * * : * commit("Secure Hash Algorithm") HEAD(HEAD -> master) * Author (E-mail) * * --- * : * --oneline >commit(7-8) HEAD <br> >f9a2f8d (HEAD -> master) Test Commit 20181105_12:35 * --graph commit * --author="name" * --grep="XXX" commit * -S="" * --since --until ~ * --after --before * -p or --patch ``` commit commit & diff -p - ``` * --stat ``` commit commit ca82a6dff817ec66f44342007202690a93763949 (HEAD -> master, origin/master,origin/HEAD) Author: Scott Chacon Date: Mon Mar 17 21:52:11 2008 -0700 changed the verison number <--- Rakefile | 2 +- <--- + - 1 file changed, 1 insertion(+), 1 deletion(-) <--- ``` * --pretty > ``` EX: --pretty=oneline --pretty=format:"%h - %an, %ar : %s" (Commit hash)-(Author name),(Author date, relative):(Subject) ``` --- #### git rm * **EX: add or modified** commit error * error: the following file has changes staged in the index: * error: the following file has local modifications: * (Untracked) error * fatal: pathspec 'UnTrackedFile.txt' did not match any files * git status **deleted: FileName** > commit * : * --cached > (Untracked) > PS. (Repository) #### git diff ``` L:\Git_Work\Git_Test_20181102>git diff diff --git a/UnTrackedFile.txt b/UnTrackedFile.txt index 65ff6f9..3b01642 100644 --- a/UnTrackedFile.txt <-- +++ b/UnTrackedFile.txt <--- @@ -1,3 +1,2 @@ ``` * Modified staged * * - + * * `-1,3` 1 - 3 * `+1,2` 1 - 2 * : * --staged * --cached * commit staged --- #### git mv * or ``` EX: git mv FileName NewFileName<--- git mv FileName NewAddress/FileName <--- ``` --- #### git reset <commit id> or * --> (UnTracked) Working tree commit * * --SOFT <> > added * --MIXED <> > UnTracked * --HARD <> > * > commit id commit #### git checkout -- <file name>> Modified Modify --- #### git clone <url> <specified dir> repository `( .git)` --- #### git remote repository * add < shortname > < url > > url repository shortname url * show <shortname> > remote * : * -v > remote url --- #### git fetch <remote shortname> <branch name> :<local new create branch> Commit origin/master * remote shortname > remote * branch name > * local new create branch > * origin/master * merge HEAD FETCH_HEAD --- #### git pull <remote shortname> <branch name> :<local new create branch> branch * fetch * merge HEAD FETCH_HEAD --- #### git push <remote shortname> <branch name> --- #### git branch * branch * * git branch <branch name> > * git branch -m <origin branch name> <change branch name> > * git branch -d <branch name> > * git branch -D <branch name> > --- #### git checkout <branch name> * * * * git checkout -b <branch name> > --- #### git gc ---

Page.title: JAVA-Spring WebSite for Eclipse for XML
Page._content:
## JAVA-Spring WebSite for Eclipse for XML 
### Web.xml 
*  `<context-param>`  `mvc-config.xml` **contextConfigLocation**
```xml
	<context-param>
		<param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
		<param-value>/WEB-INF/mvc-config.xml</param-value>		
	</context-param>
```
*  `<listener>`
```xml
    <listener>
		<listener-class>org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoaderListener</listener-class>
	</listener>
```
> P.S.  `<context-param>` **contextConfigLocation**`<listener>`

### For MVC
*  `<servlet>`  **DispatherServlet****(front controller)** 
```xml
	<servlet>
		<servlet-name>translator</servlet-name>
		<servlet-class>org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet</servlet-class>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
			<param-value></param-value>
		</init-param>
		<load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
	</servlet>
```
>  `contextConfigLocation`  `Servlet- servlet.xml`

*  `<servlet-mapping>`  **Controller**
```xml
    <servlet-mapping>
		<servlet-name>translator</servlet-name>
		<url-pattern>*.action</url-pattern>		
	</servlet-mapping>
```

* 
   1. client request 
   2. servlet-mapping  url
   3.  mapping  dispatcherServlet  
   4.  dispatcher-servlet.xml  Controller

### var & val * var * * val * * `val | var name[:Type] = value` * * * * * ```kt var i:Int i = 10 ``` * * * * ```kt var i 10 ``` * PS. **** ### & !! * **null**
``
**null**````
**null** `!!` ```kt class RecentUseComparator:Comparator { override fun compare(lhs: UsageStats?, rhs: UsageStats?): Int { return if(lhs!!.lastTimeUsed > rhs!!.lastTimeUsed){ -1 }else if(lhs!!.lastTimeUsed == rhs!!.lastTimeUsed){ 0 }else{ 1 } } } ``` ### * Number Type * * Long : -2^63-1 ~ 2^63 * Uint : 2^32 * Int : -2^31-1 ~ 2^31 * Short : -2^15-1 ~ 2^15 * Byte : -2^7-1 ~ 2^7 * * Float : -2^31-1 ~ 2^31 * Double : -2^63-1 ~ 2^63 * String Type * char * * * **'** * String * * * **"** * Template Literals * * * **$** name * **{arg...}** ```kt var c:Char = 'F' var s1:String = "Hello" var s2 = "World" var i = 10; var j = 20; println("$s1 $s2 , i + j = ${i+j}") ``` ### Function * `fun` * `fun name(arg1:Type...)[:ReturnType]{ .... }` * * `name(arg1,arg2)` * () * **,** * `arg:Type` * * **{** **}** * * * **Return Type** * = ```kt fun testFn(arg:Int):Int{ return 10 } //return this is xxx fun testFn2(v:Int) = println("this is ${v}") ``` ### Access Modifier * public - * internal - .kt * protected - * private - > PS. public ### oject * class * * `class name {}` * * * * `class name[constructor(arg:Type ....)]` * class `init{}` * * * class `constructor(){}` * `constructor():this(arg){}` * proterty * getter & setter * * * set(value) * function * `set(value){ }` * get() * function * `get(){ retrun name }` * field * * * inherit * **open** class * * `class sub constructor():FatherClass` * override * **open** fun * override * **override** fun ```kt open class human(){ var sex:String = "man" set(value) { field = value } get() = field var age:Int = 0 init{ } open fun speak(v:String) = println(v) open fun see(v: String) = println(v) } class User:human() { var name = "" var userName get() = "~$name~" set(v){ name = v } override fun speak(v: String) { println("I'm speaking....") super.speak(v) } override fun see(v: String) { println("I'm seeing....") super.see(v) } } ``` ### companion object * * * * java **static** * ```js class User { companion object { var instance = User() } fun printlnUser() { } } User.instance.printlnUser() ``` ### if...else * Statement() Expression() * else ```kt var ifi = 20 var ifj = 3 //Statement if (ifi == 10){ ifj = 20 } else{ ifj = 40 } println("ifi = $ifi so ifj=$ifj") //Expression var if2i = 20 var if2j = if(if2i == 20){ 60 }else{ 70 } println("if2i = $if2i so if2j=$if2j") ``` #### when * Statement() Expression() * switch ... case * else ```kt var wi = 10; var wj = 0; when(wi){ 0 ->{ wj = 4 } 10 ->{ wj=10 } else ->{ wj = 20 } } println("Statement when: wi = $wi so wj=$wj") var w2i = 10 var w2j = when(wi){ 0 ->{ 14 } 10 ->{ 1 } else ->{ 30 } } println("Expression when: w2i = $w2i so w2j=$w2j") ``` ### in * Control Flow * true | false ### as * * ### is * * true | false

# Install

## Requirement

1. xcode
   -  App Store or [Apple Developer](https://developer.apple.com/download/more/)
2. android
3. react-native-cli
   - npm install -g react-native-cli
4. watchman
   - brew install watchman

# Create React Native Project

> react-native init < project name >

# 

react native web ` (div  span  li ..etc )` component 

# Document Architecture

```
 __tests__
 node_modules
 android
 ios
 app.json
 babel.config.js
 App.js
 index.js
 metro.config.js
 package.json
 yarn.lock
```

# command

# native-base

# react-native navigation

 react native  

Hierarchy 

 **Hierarchy** 

- Root
- Modal
- Overlay

 **Layout**   :

- Stack
- Bottom tabs
- Side Menu
- External Component

## 

### 

- node >= 8
- react-native >= 0.51

### command

> yarn add react-native-navigation

##  navigation

`index.js`,

```javascript
Navigation.events().registerAppLaunchedListener(() => {
  // Each time the event is received you should call Navigation.setRoot
  Navigation.registerComponent('Home', () => Component);
  Navigation.setRoot({
    root: {
      component: {
        name: 'Home',
      },
    },
  });
});
```

- `registerAppLaunchedListener`  APP 

- `Navigation.registerComponent(component name , react component)`  
   react component  navigation  **(component name)**

- `Navigation.setRoot(layout)`  root  Layout

##  Command

# Question

-  ios  `linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)`  
   `Mac OS 10.14` `xcode 10`  
   os & xcode 

-  `run react-native run-ios` `xcrun: error: active developer path`

*  `xcode 10`   `xcode 12`
*   `sudo xcode-select -switch <Xcode.app > ` Xcode 

-  react-native link

-  ios 

  > Showing All Messages
  > Multiple commands produce 'shoppingcarSkeleton.app/Zocial.ttf'

-  react native debugger  ios

### webpack 
```js
var path = require('path'); //
var webpack = require('webpack');

module.exports={
	entry:[//
		"./main.jsx"
	],
	output:{//
		path:path.join(__dirname,"dist"),//
		filename:"compiled.js",//
		publicPath:"/"//
	},
	resolve:{// import | require  & 
		modules:[
			path.resolve(__dirname,'src'), 'node_modules'//
		],
		extensions:['.js','jsx','css','scss']//
	},
	module:{// ex:babelTypeScript .js
		rules:[
			{
				test:/\.(js|jsx)$/,//".js or jsx"
				loader:"babel-loader",//
				exclude:/node_modules/
			},
			{
				test:/\.css$/,//".css"
				loader:["css-loader","style-loader"],//
				exclude:/node_modules/
			}
		]
	},
	devtool:'cheap-module-eval-source-map',
	plugins:[
		new webpack.HotModuleReplacementPlugin(),//Module
		new webpack.ProvidePlugin({
			React:'react',
			RectDOM:'react-dom'
        }),// key  import value
        new HtmlWebpackPlugin()//config output.path html
	]
};
```
### .babelrc 
* 
*  jsx 
*

```json
          },

        }
      ],
      "@babel/preset-react"
    ],
    "plugins": ["transform-class-properties"]
}
```
